mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory_deduction_log ( order_id, user_id, activity_id, goods_id, quantity, before_saleable, after_saleable, before_frozen, after_frozen, lock_version, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{activityId}, #{goodsId}, #{quantity}, #{beforeSaleable}, #{afterSaleable}, #{beforeFrozen}, #{afterFrozen}, #{lockVersion}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, user_id, activity_id, goods_id, quantity, before_saleable, after_saleable, before_frozen, after_frozen, lock_version, status, create_time FROM inventory_deduction_log WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT id, order_id, user_id, activity_id, goods_id, quantity, before_saleable, after_saleable, before_frozen, after_frozen, lock_version, status, create_time FROM inventory_deduction_log WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT id, order_id, user_id, activity_id, goods_id, quantity, before_saleable, after_saleable, before_frozen, after_frozen, lock_version, status, create_time FROM inventory_deduction_log WHERE create_time < #{archiveDate} ORDER BY id
